amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on the continued development of an end to end point of care clinical diagnostic network to combat terrorism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3534 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3534 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S7380-7381; text: CR S7380-7381) To express the sense of Congress on the continued development of an end to end point of care clinical diagnostic network to combat terrorism.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3534 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3534 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kyl.
